Description: Foot and wall sherd (mended from two fragments, including 1886,0401.793) of Attic black-glazed pottery stemless cup (Castulo type); ring foot with a groove on its outer face and shallow groove on resting surface; wholly glazed save for resting surface and underside, which has a dot and circle at centre; inscription cut on underside.
Curator's comments: Sherd joins British Museum 1886, 0401.793. Pencilled on underside: 383.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 383) ((Dedications to Apollo))
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1838)
